The acronym: LGBTP" allegedly represents "Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender, and Pedosexual" on the poster.
The image has circulated on multiple ins: with one Instagram post receiving over 11,000 likes.
Experts: including Scott McCoy from the Southern Poverty Law Center and Dr. Fred Berlin from Johns Hopkins Sex and Gender Clinic, confirm that the claim is false and that there is no evidence-based justification for linking the LGBTQ community with pedophilia.
